SEARCH
Package com.game

Class Game

java.lang.Object
com.game.Game
All Implemented Interfaces:
ija.ija2024.tool.common.Observable.Observer, ija.ija2024.tool.common.ToolEnvironment
public class Game extends Object implements ija.ija2024.tool.common.ToolEnvironment, ija.ija2024.tool.common.Observable.Observer
Class representing a game board. Including the board dimensions, 2D list of GameNodes, 2D list of integers representing number of rotations from a correct rotation and a boolean whether a power node is present on the game board.
